Package de.marcandreher.fusionkit.core.externals

Class DiscordWebhook.Embed

java.lang.Object
de.marcandreher.fusionkit.core.externals.DiscordWebhook.Embed
Enclosing class:
DiscordWebhook
public static class DiscordWebhook.Embed extends Object
Represents a Discord embed with rich content.
